articles.description: BYU went 42-10 and tied LMU for the WCC championship, but the Lions got the league’s automatic bid into the Big Dance and the Cougars will miss the tourney for the first time since 2004
articles.content:
Despite winning a piece of the West Coast Conference title on Saturday, the BYU softball team will not be playing in the NCAA Softball Championships this year.
